eventDecorators.name: LogWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

functionDecorators.name: executeOperation
functionDecorators.description: This function is called after your contract has received the flash loaned amount migrate --reset f = await Flashloan.deployed() run verify Flashloan --license none let sender = await web3.eth.getAccounts() sender = sender[0]; web3.eth.sendTransaction({from:sender, to:f.address, value: '10000000000000000000'}) //test ### await f.convertEthToDai.sendTransaction('10000000000000000000',{from:sender, to:f.address, value: '100000000000000000'}) await f.flashloan('0xEeeeeEeeeEeEeeEeEeEeeEEEeeeeEeeeeeeeEEeE', 1000000000000000000) await f.withdraw('0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000') //CONVERTER BIGNUMBER parseInt(xx.toString(),10);.

functionDecorators.name: flashloan
functionDecorators.description: Flash loan 1000000000000000000 wei (1 ether) worth of `_asset`.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
